desc: A studio course focusing on the artistic decision-making process of stage direction, script analysis, directorial concepts, production designs and hands-on directing experience building on the skills developed in Theater 232: Stage Direction. Students direct a one-act play as the final project for the course. Prerequisite: Theater 232, 240, or 250. Theater 270 or 271 recommended. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Intermed Stage Direction
title: Intermediate Stage Direction
